attributes.action: Stop making Elderly people over 80 pay for their care homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see all cost for the over 80,s being met by the government,because at present they may have served their country in the second world war, possibly worked all their life in our case until he was 70 and is how 84 suffering from dementia and we repay them by taking all they have worked ie property or savings to cover costs of a  care home for their last few years and their family get no inheritance this is totally unfair to people at this age because their is not enough facilities for everyone and if you own your own home you are forced to pay your fees ,what is the difference if you own your home or not you should still be entitled to the same care or care value
